messages.content: Too many people have been let down by an economy run for the benefit of a few people at the top. And there is deep anger at the Liberal Democrat support, especially from our current MP. Vote for Tory policy?

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Balance the books and cut the deficit every year - our commitments do not require more borrowing

keyPolicies.policyTitle: HIGHER LIVING STANDARDS FOR WORKING FAMILIES
keyPolicies.policyDescription: A freeze on energy bills until 2017; a 20,000 more homes with a childcare guarantee; a minimum wage of £8 & 25 hours of free childcare a week

keyPolicies.policyTitle: AN NHS WITH THE TIME TO CARE
keyPolicies.policyDescription: 20,000 more nurses, 8,000 more GPs, and we will join up services from home to hospital
People who come here won't be able to claim benefits for at least 2 weeks and we will make it illegal for employers to undercut wages by exploiting workers

keyPolicies.policyTitle: YES YOU CAN DO BETTER THAN THE LAST
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Tuition fees reduced to £6,000, apprenticeships for every school leaver with the grades & smaller class sizes for 5, 6 & 7 year olds

issues.economy: Too many people have been let down by an economy run for the benefit of a few people at the top.
issues.education: Tuition fees reduced to £6,000, apprenticeships for every school leaver with the grades & smaller class sizes for 5, 6 & 7 year olds
issues.governance: Deep anger at the Liberal Democrat support, especially from our current MP.
issues.health: 20,000 more nurses, 8,000 more GPs, and we will join up services from home to hospital
issues.immigration: People who come here won't be able to claim benefits for at least 2 weeks and we will make it illegal for employers to undercut wages by exploiting workers

housing.content: A 20,000 more homes with a childcare guarantee

leaflet.personalStatement: This election is hugely important to the people of Cheadle and the whole country.
leaflet.additionalNotes: Martin Miller is married to Judith, with 5 young daughters attending local schools.
